column1: Important paper @JAMA suggests that resolved #COVID19 cases may still shed #coronavirus according to RT-#PCR. Small #of cases but still worrisome.
#Wuhan #Coronavirus #Virus Linked to Seafood Market Not Currently Spreading according @WHO https://nyti.ms/2FIj1SX

Kudos to #Chinese researchers who shared draft #genome of #coronavirus implicated in #Wuhan #pneumonia #outbreakhttps://www.sciencemag.org/news/2020/01/chinese-researchers-reveal-draft-genome-virus-implicated-wuhan-pneumonia-outbreak …
#China reports new #Wuhan #coronavirus cases, raising concern globally before key holiday. #epidemic #IDTwitter #epiTwitterhttps://reut.rs/2R5YSgc
You probably remember #SARS, which was a #coronavirus....

@WHO is holding an emergency meeting to discuss if #NCoV should be designated a pathogen of international concern now that person to person transmission has been confirmed.  Stay vigilent!  #coronavirus #epidemic #outbreak #EpiTwitter #IDTwitter
